summary: An alcohol/drug abuser re-examines his life until he nearly dies from an overdose. Then a friend convinces him to join a self-help group which turns out to be demonic.
cast: Mark Borchardt|Tom Schimmels|Miriam Frost|Tommy Dallace|Robert Richard Jorge|Sherrie Beaupre|Jack Bennett|Mark Nadolski|Scott Berendt|Barbara Zanger|Donna McMaster|Mike Schank|Cindy Snyder|Nancy Williams|Wayne Buboise|Kurt Poth|Robert Smith|Kelley Cork|Betsy Schaefer|Brian Smith|Damien McLaughlin|Ray Kilzer|Mike Badem|Geoff Fieldbinder|John Wilhelm|Jeremy Stevermer|Brian Stodola|Bill Borchardt
title: Coven
